p: Furthermore, the results of this study showed a significant increase in lipid peroxidation and elevated level of hydrogen peroxide content in the liver of alloxan-induced diabetic rats, indicating oxidative stress. This confirms the report on the ability of diabetogenic compounds to induce oxidative damage through the generation of free radicals [ 30]. However, the administration of MLEMC reduced hepatic MDA and hydrogen peroxide levels, thereby substantiating its antioxidant ability.
